dct_title_s: [Series of maps from Coleman's An historical text book and atlas of biblical geography]
dct_description_sm: [Lyman Coleman] ; engd. on steel by W. Williams.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on maps given in "Miles" and "Geographical miles".
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
3 inset maps: Mountains of Sinai -- Environs of Jerusalem -- Map of the northern coast of Syria.
Appears in Coleman's An historical text book and atlas of biblical geography.
